price: “Maatii Luux malee dhugumatti, nuti hunduma ta’anii isaan baraarsoodha.”
arabic: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: illā āla lūṭin innā lamunajjūhum ajmaʿīna
